Member Function Documentation

byte* HttpFileHandler::getFile (  const MC2String &  fileString,
int &  length,
struct stat *  status
) 
 

Delivers a file as a byte array.

The user must delete the file.

Parameters:
fileString is the path and name of the file.
length is set to the length of the buffer.
status is set to the status of the file.
Returns:
the file as a byte vector.

const char* HttpFileHandler::getFileType (  const MC2String &  ext,
byte *  file
)  [static]
 

Takes an extension and returns corresponding Content-Type.

Returns WAP 1.1 mime-types for WML and WMLS.

Parameters:
ext is the extension of the filetype requested.
file is a pointer to the file of the extension. Only used for deferencing between wmlsc 1.0 and 1.1.
Returns:
the type of file.
